in-browser art software

  • magma ‚≠ê

    collaborative raster canvas -- sometimes pen pressure doesn't work in firefox, but it runs great for me in chrome!

  • figma ‚≠ê

    collaborative vector workspace with ui wireframing features

  • photopea

    photoshop -- i've used it to radial-blur memes HA

  • excalidraw

    collaborative infinite whiteboard (end-to-end encrypted!)

cool tools

  • squoosh

    image compressor (no server, done locally!)

  • dither it!

    dither images with customizable palettes and settings

  • doodad pattern generator

    customize seamless royalty-free patterns

  • jsfxr

    8-bit sound effect generator

  • calligraphr

    turn handwriting etc. into font -- i made my h1 font with this!

  • everything ‚≠ê

    a file search for windows computers that actually works

  • onelook thesarus

    for when you can't think of the word for something

fun stuff

  • noclip

    free-camera through 3d videogame locations and browse the textures

  • sandspiel ‚≠ê

    excellent "falling sand" game with cool wind physics

  • windows93

    cool desktop simulator complete with widgets and working programs

  • minecraft classic

    minecraft in browser -- seems it can run multiplayer!

  • the spriters resource

    videogame sprite archive -- they have sites for models, textures, and sounds too!

  • khinsider video game music

    game ost archive

  • listen to wikipedia

    real-time wikipedia update visualizer (soundualizer?)

  • every noise at once

    listenable scatter plot of 6k+ music genres

  • my retro tvs

    channel-surf tv clips (and even ads) from specific decades

  • wiby

    search engine for "old web" type sites

  • kilogram

    gag photosite where every image is compressed to 1KB or less

  • texture town

    texture gallery -- check out the playroom where you can drag your own images onto 3d objects!

game making

  • twine ‚≠ê

    no-code text-based games -- they export to HTML so you can play 'em in any browser!

  • twine docs: cookbook

  • twine docs: harlowe manual

  • ren'py

    visual novel engine

  • bitsy

    haven't tried this one myself, but it looks neat and exports to HTML

art making / art reference

  • krita ‚≠ê

    the main drawing program i've been using for years! took me a bit to rearrange the ui and set my shortcuts, but it's rather fully-featured!

  • firealpaca ‚≠ê

    a lightweight drawing program! its gif export function is the only thing in the world that doesn't compress/dither/destroy my frame quality godbless...

  • sketchfab ‚≠ê

    rotatable 3d model database, great for looking at classic fiat 500's

  • magicposer ‚≠ê

    poseable humans

  • male head light reference tool

    rotatable head statue with light source

  • freephotomuscle

    buff guy scenarios

  • reference angle -- humans

    find human head pics by angle

  • reference angle -- animals

    find animal head pics by angle

web coding

  • (see "site credits" for more specific web things i used)

  • so, you want a basic color code, huh?

    straightforward web color gallery

  • badideas.css

    cool css effects like shudder, upside-down, and sparkle text

  • p5.js

    beginner-conscious javascript library for creative coding

  • matter.js

    javascript 2d physics engine for web

  • three.js

    javascript 3d graphics for web

  • google fonts ‚≠ê

    embed and download fonts
